title: Elgon Valley Color Fest 2025
description: Get ready for the biggest color explosion in Elgeyo! A day of music, paint, and pure fun. Come dressed in white and leave in colors. DJs, local artists, and food stalls available.

title: Nairobi Tech Expo 2025
description: Explore the future of technology, innovation, and startups in Kenya. Join entrepreneurs, developers, and investors for two days of exhibitions, talks, and workshops.

title: Rhythms of the Rift Valley
description: Experience live performances from the Rift’s finest. A celebration of local talent, culture, and art. Enjoy traditional and modern Kenyan music in a scenic sunset view.

title: Tikozetu Fashion Night
description: A night of style, elegance, and culture. Join Kenya’s top designers and models for the ultimate fashion showcase. Dress code: Elegant Black & Gold.

title: Iten Marathon 2025
description: Run with the champions! The Iten Marathon brings together athletes from all over Kenya. Open to amateurs and professionals. Register early to get your official Tikozetu race kit.
